attributes.action: Make bank note's sized according to their value.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we think that money should be sized according to it's value so blind people will be able to use bank note's easier.

rejection.details:
Dear Luke

Whilst it is the Bank of England that is responsible for the design of notes rather then the Government, they are already arranged in size order, with the smallest being the £5 note and the largest the £50
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
